mean_en: having enough skill or knowledge to do something well or to the necessary standard; of a good standard but not very good; having the power to decide something
sentence: She\u0027s a competent worker and is good at her job.
sentence_trans: 她是一个有能力的员工，并且擅长她的工作。
word_etyma: com共同 + pet追寻，寻求 + ent……的 → competent有资格的
